name: Movimento per la Decrescita Felice
goal:
The Movement is structured in local clubs, spread all over Italy, and thematic workgroups. Its distinguishing trait is a “pragmatic” approach to the concept of degrowth.
Little can be done individually, but things change when acting together. MDF would like to serve as a reference point not only to disseminate a theory, but also to provide its supporters with the opportunity to meet, discuss, further elaborate the concept and – above all – to put it into practice, here and now!
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Energy, Climate change, Economy, Job Creation and Unemployment, Social Equity,
